cause.description:
In 1981, a band called Minor Threat created a new cause. It's called straight edge. This is a lifetime commitment to abstaining from drugs and alcohol. Basically, we want to be poison free.
1. Abstinence of Drugs
2. Abstinence of Alcohol
3. Abstinence of Casual Sex
cause.mission: have a life clean of drugs and alcohol, and abstaining from drugs and alcohol for life.
cause.name: Straight Edge World Wide
